name: mana_break
description:
short movement test for my game, might one day make it into a arena fps.

shooting isnt implemented properly yet

how to play:

wasd + space

hold space to climb walls / ceilings

right click to boost ( uses mana )

shift to slide  ( uses mana )

you regain mana automatically,

collect crystals for a quick mana pickup

tricks:

moving diagonally is faster

you move fastest going backwards ( on the ground )

if you tap jump straight out of an ariel slide you get a boost

probably some more im forgetting :P

love always,
